a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Disease burden from non-communicable diseases by age, World,
Disease burden from non-communicable diseases (NCDs) by age. Disease burden is measured in DALYs
(Disability-Adjusted Life Years). DALYs are used to measure total burden of disease - both from years of life lost and years
lived with a disability. One DALY equals one lost year of healthy life.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
